data.name: richTextBox1.Text
data.value:
JAJEP Inc. (Jhovani, Arturo, Jose, Edgar, and Patel)
Basic Tab __________________________________________________________________________________________________ • Click the File on the top left corner to select from various options.
• Please click on the “Import” option to select from various import data files.
• The user must import Professor’s data before any calculations being made. To calculate the UH professor’s data please click on the first option “Professor Data.” After choosing the Professors Data please select the file.
• If the user wishes to calculate the Compression data please click on the second option “Compression Data.”
• If the user wishes to calculate the Equity data please click on the third option “Equity Data.” If the user wishes to calculate the UH equity data please select the first option “UH Data” or if the user wishes to calculate the Tier 1 data please select the second option “Tier 1 Data.”
• After the calculations are made and if the user wishes to export the data to a different file please click on the fourth option “Export.”
• Under the File menu if the user wishes to save the data at any time please click on the “Save Work Space.”
• If at any time the user wishes to exit the software please click on the “Exit” under the File menu.
• If the user wishes to view the Basic data, please click on the first tab “Basic.”
• If the user wishes to view the Compression data, click on the second tab “Compression.”
• If the user wishes to view the Equity data, please click on the third tab “Equity.”
• If the user wisher to add new formulas to calculate the other functions, please click on the fourth tab “Formulas.”
• If the user wishes to view more options, please go to Tools menu and click on the first option “Option.”
• If the user wishes to add any employee’s data, please go to Tools menu and click on the second option “Add Employee Data.”
• After the file “Professor Data” is imported, if the user wishes to view the employee by their job title then please select the options populated from the filter Job Title
• After either of the file “Professor Data” is imported, if the user wishes to view the employee by their Department ID then please select the options populated from the filter Dept ID.
• After either of the file “Professor Data” is imported, if the user wishes to view the employee by their Gender then please select the options populated in the filter Gender. Please click “All” if the user wishes to filter the data with all genders. Please click “Female” if the user wishes to filter the data with female gender. Please click “Male” if the user wishes to filter the data with male gender.
• If at any time the user wishes to reset the filters, please click on the “Reset All” button to reset all the filters.
• After choosing the filters, if the user wishes to view calculated value of Mean, 1st Quartile, 3rd Quartile, and Median, please click on the “Calculate” button to view all the calculated values respectively.
• For the compression data, if the user wishes to filter from the Dept ID, please select the options from the populated data.
• For the compression data, if the user wishes to filter from the Gender option, please select the options from the “All,” or “Female,” or “Male.”
• For the compression data, the user has to input the values for Compression Variables “d” and “k.”
• If the user wishes to view the calculated values of Actual Medians, Adjust Medians and Compression Ratio, please click on the “Calculate” button.
• For the Equity Data, if the user wants to filter from the Dept ID, please select the options from the populated data.
• For the Equity Data, if the user wishes to calculate the Internal Equity, please select the numerator from the drop down menu and select the denominator.
• For the Equity Data, to view the internal equity calculated value, please click “Calculate.”
• For the Equity Data, if the user wishes to calculate the External Equity, please select the numerator from the drop down menu and select the denominator.
• For the Equity Data, to view the internal equity calculated value, please click “Calculate.”
• If the user wishes to add new formulas, please select from the Formula List and write the formula as desired in the Formula box and then click “Save” and if the user wishes to edit the formula please select the formula from the formula box and then click “Edit.”
